Blinding Dust.name: Blinding Dust
Blinding Dust.flavor: You spray a handful of poisonous dust into the air, blinding your enemies.
Blinding Dust.attack:
Dexterity + 4 vs. Fortitude
Level 21: Dexterity + 6 vs. Fortitude
Blinding Dust.onHit: 2d6 + Dexterity modifier poison damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.

Insidious Attack.name: Insidious Attack
Insidious Attack.flavor: The poison delivered by your weapon fills your enemy with crippling pain that ravages its system when it tries to act.
Insidious Attack.requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow or a light blade.
Insidious Attack.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and make a secondary attack against the target.
Insidious Attack.secondaryOnHit: The target takes ongoing 15 poison damage, and whenever the target moves more than 2 squares during its turn or makes an attack, it takes 5 poison damage after the attack is resolved (save ends both).

Persistent Poison.name: Persistent Poison
Persistent Poison.flavor: Just when an enemy thinks it has beaten your attack, your poison proves effective after all.
Persistent Poison.trigger: An enemy within 10 squares of you saves against a poison effect
Persistent Poison.target: The triggering enemy in the burst
Persistent Poison.effect: The target fails the saving throw.
